name: get-merchants-merchantId-paymentMethodSettings
description:
Returns details for all payment methods of the merchant account identified in the path.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”Payment methods read

merchantId.description: The unique identifier of the merchant account.

storeId.description: The unique identifier of the store for which to return the payment methods.

businessLineId.description: The unique identifier of the Business Line for which to return the payment methods.

pageSize.description: The number of items to have on a page, maximum 100. The default is 10 items on a page.

pageNumber.description: The number of the page to fetch.

**itemsTotal**: Total number of items.
**pagesTotal**: Total number of pages.
